pr_title: HADOOP-17131. Refactor S3A Listing code for better isolation.

timeline.message: HADOOP-17131 Moving listing to use operation callback
Moving listing methods to Listing class for better abstraction
Adding ListingOperationCallbacks interface for list ops

timeline.bodyText: not true any more though, not now there's a new listing interface, right?
timeline.author: steveloughran

replies.bodyText: Ah.. I updated the doc in the start. Will fix. Thanks
replies.author: mukund-thakur

timeline.bodyText: I'd rather these were left out of the context and only explicitly passed to those classes which explicitly needed the operations. That helps us stay in control of what operations specific modules can perform
timeline.author: steveloughran

timeline.bodyText: have this take the context and the ListingOperationCallbacks, add a method in S3AFS createListing() which can be used there and in DumpS3GuardDynamoTable...that avoids having to extend the store context
timeline.author: steveloughran

timeline.bodyText: Make the type of this field the interface for strictness
timeline.author: steveloughran
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -293,6 +294,9 @@
   private final S3AFileSystem.OperationCallbacksImpl
       operationCallbacks = new OperationCallbacksImpl();
 
+  private final S3AFileSystem.ListingOperationCallbacksImpl

timeline.author: steveloughran
steveloughran

replies.bodyText:
Felt like below three methods are generic for context so I added here such that if required in future it can be used by other operations as well. I think the reason you are saying to add in ListingOperationCallbacks is because these are currently only used in Listing Operations.
I can put in Listing as well.
replies.author: mukund-thakur

timeline.bodyText:
I'd keep it as a subclass of AbstractStoreOperation.
we may want to declare it as Closeable, and in tests and S3AFS call close()/closeQuietly() on it. Gives us the option of doing more with it later

What I don't want -and which you have done in this commit, is add the new list commands into the OperationCallbacks interface
timeline.author: steveloughran
